hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
# configure MORSE [ -f /opt/strands/.bashrc ] && source /opt/strands/.bashrc
#### CUDA export PATH=/usr/local/cuda-5.5/bin:$PATH export LD_LIBRARY_PATH=/usr/local/cuda-5.5/lib64:$LD_LIBRARY_PATH
################################################################# # MIRA configuration export MIRA_PATH=/opt/MIRA export LD_LIBRARY_PATH=${LD_LIBRARY_PATH}:/opt/MIRA/lib export PATH=${PATH}:/opt/MIRA/bin
[ -f /opt/ros/groovy/setup.bash ] && source /opt/ros/groovy/setup.bash
source /opt/strands/strands_catkin_ws/devel/setup.bash
# FSM setup export PYTHONPATH=/opt/lib/python2.7/site-packages:$PYTHONPATH export PATH=/opt/bin:$PATH
# source other jenkins workspace source /var/lib/jenkins/jobs/catkin_make_strands_desktop_full/workspace/catkin_ws/devel/setup.bash
cd $WORKSPACE/fsm_testing/ make
# allow to access VGL xauth merge /etc/opt/VirtualGL/vgl_xauth_key
# configure the test: export ROSPKG=fsm_testing export ROSLAUNCH=patrol.launch
# clean workspace rm -rf $WORKSPACE/output $WORKSPACE/var
# run the test fsmtest -o $WORKSPACE/output strands_patrol.scxml
